ProductInfo.Features:
real-time recording on 16 channels at 340X240 resolution
1 terabyte 24/7 100% duty cycle hard drive pre-installed, expandable up to 4TB
Indudes USB mouse, remote, ethernet cable, power supplies and 8 60ft. BNC/power cables, one for each included camera
Free Lorex DDNS service for guaranteed remote connection
Simultaneous viewing, recording, playback, backup, and setup
ProductInfo.Name: Lorex ECO 16-Channel Security DVR with 8 Indoor/Outdoor Security Cameras
